verses.verse: And they continued <S%H3427><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> without <S%H369><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Syria <S%H758><s%> and Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> in the third <S%H7992><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> that Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his servants, <S%H5650><s%> Know <S%H3045><s%> ye that <S%H3588><s%> Ramoth in Gilead <S%H7433><s%> is ours, and we <S%H587><s%> be still, <S%H2814><s%> and take <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3947><s%> it not out of the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Syria? <S%H758><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Jehoshaphat, <S%H3092><s%> Wilt thou go <S%H1980><s%> with <S%H854><s%> me to battle <S%H4421><s%> to Ramoth-gilead? <S%H7433><s%> And Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> I am as thou art, my people <S%H5971><s%> as thy people, <S%H5971><s%> my horses <S%H5483><s%> as thy horses. <S%H5483><s%>

And Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Inquire, <S%H1875><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> at <S%H853><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> today. <S%H3117><s%>

Then the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gathered the prophets together, <S%H6908><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5030><s%> about four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Shall I go <S%H1980><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Ramoth-gilead <S%H7433><s%> to battle, <S%H4421><s%> or <S%H518><s%> shall I forbear? <S%H2308><s%> And they said, <S%H559><s%> Go up; <S%H5927><s%> for the Lord <S%H136><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> it into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king. <S%H4428><s%>

And Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Is there not <S%H369><s%> here <S%H6311><s%> a prophet <S%H5030><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> besides, <S%H5750><s%> that we might inquire <S%H1875><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> him?

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Jehoshaphat, <S%H3092><s%> There is yet <S%H5750><s%> one <S%H259><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> Micaiah <S%H4321><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Imlah, <S%H3229><s%> by <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> whom we may inquire <S%H1875><s%> of <S%H853><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> but I <S%H589><s%> hate <S%H8130><s%> him; for <S%H3588><s%> he doth not <S%H3808><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> me, but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> evil. <S%H7451><s%> And Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Let not <S%H408><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> say <S%H559><s%> so. <S%H3651><s%>

Then the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H413><s%> an <S%H259><s%> officer, <S%H5631><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Hasten <S%H4116><s%> hither Micaiah <S%H4321><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Imlah. <S%H3229><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> each <S%H376><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> his throne, <S%H3678><s%> having put on <S%H3847><s%> their robes, <S%H899><s%> in a void place <S%H1637><s%> in the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Samaria; <S%H8111><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> prophesied <S%H5012><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them.

And Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Chenaanah <S%H3668><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> him horns <S%H7161><s%> of iron: <S%H1270><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> With these <S%H428><s%> shalt thou push <S%H5055><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Syrians, <S%H758><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> thou have consumed <S%H3615><s%> them.

And all <S%H3605><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> prophesied <S%H5012><s%> so, <S%H3651><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Go up <S%H5927><s%> to Ramoth-gilead, <S%H7433><s%> and prosper: <S%H6743><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> it into the king's <S%H4428><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And the messenger <S%H4397><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was gone <S%H1980><s%> to call <S%H7121><s%> Micaiah <S%H4321><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, saying, <S%H559><s%> Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the prophets <S%H5030><s%> declare good <S%H2896><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> with one <S%H259><s%> mouth: <S%H6310><s%> let thy word, <S%H1697><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> like the word <S%H1697><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> of them, <S%H4480><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> that which is good. <S%H2896><s%>

And Micaiah <S%H4321><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> As the LORD <S%H3068><s%> liveth, <S%H2416><s%> what <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, that will I speak. <S%H1696><s%>

So he came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the king. <S%H4428><s%> And the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Micaiah, <S%H4321><s%> shall we go <S%H1980><s%> against <S%H413><s%> Ramoth-gilead <S%H7433><s%> to battle, <S%H4421><s%> or <S%H518><s%> shall we forbear? <S%H2308><s%> And he answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H413><s%> him, Go, <S%H5927><s%> and prosper: <S%H6743><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> it into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king. <S%H4428><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, How <S%H5704><s%> many <S%H4100><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> shall I <S%H589><s%> adjure <S%H7650><s%> thee that <S%H834><s%> thou tell <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413><s%> me nothing <S%H3808><s%> but <S%H7535><s%> that which is true <S%H571><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD? <S%H3068><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> scattered <S%H6327><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> the hills, <S%H2022><s%> as sheep <S%H6629><s%> that <S%H834><s%> have not <S%H369><s%> a shepherd: <S%H7462><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> These <S%H428><s%> have no <S%H3808><s%> master: <S%H113><s%> let them return <S%H7725><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to his house <S%H1004><s%> in peace. <S%H7965><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Jehoshaphat, <S%H3092><s%> Did I not <S%H3808><s%> tell <S%H559><s%> <S%H413><s%> thee that he would prophesy <S%H5012><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> me, but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> evil? <S%H7451><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> thou therefore <S%H3651><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sitting <S%H3427><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> his throne, <S%H3678><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the host <S%H6635><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> him on his right hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3225><s%> and on his left. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8040><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> shall persuade <S%H6601><s%> <S%H853><s%> Ahab, <S%H256><s%> that he may go up <S%H5927><s%> and fall <S%H5307><s%> at Ramoth-gilead? <S%H7433><s%> And one <S%H2088><s%> said <S%H559><s%> on this manner, <S%H3541><s%> and another <S%H2088><s%> said <S%H559><s%> on that manner. <S%H3541><s%>
And there came forth <S%H3318><s%> a spirit, <S%H7307><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> I <S%H589><s%> will persuade <S%H6601><s%> him.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Wherewith? <S%H4100><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> I will go forth, <S%H3318><s%> and I will be <S%H1961><s%> a lying <S%H8267><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> in the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> his prophets. <S%H5030><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> Thou shalt persuade <S%H6601><s%> him, and prevail <S%H3201><s%> also: <S%H1571><s%> go forth, <S%H3318><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> so. <S%H3651><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath put <S%H5414><s%> a lying <S%H8267><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> in the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> thy prophets, <S%H5030><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> thee.

But Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Chenaanah <S%H3668><s%> went near, <S%H5066><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> Micaiah <S%H4321><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the cheek, <S%H3895><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Which <S%H335><s%> way <S%H2088><s%> went <S%H5674><s%> the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> me to speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H854><s%> thee?

And Micaiah <S%H4321><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> thou shalt see <S%H7200><s%> in that <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> when <S%H834><s%> thou shalt go into <S%H935><s%> an inner <S%H2315><s%> chamber <S%H2315><s%> to hide thyself. <S%H2247><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> Micaiah, <S%H4321><s%> and carry him back <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Amon <S%H526><s%> the governor <S%H8269><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> Joash <S%H3101><s%> the king's <S%H4428><s%> son; <S%H1121><s%>

And say, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> Put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> fellow in the prison, <S%H1004><s%> <S%H3608><s%> and feed <S%H398><s%> him with bread <S%H3899><s%> of affliction <S%H3906><s%> and with water <S%H4325><s%> of affliction, <S%H3906><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> I come <S%H935><s%> in peace. <S%H7965><s%>

And Micaiah <S%H4321><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> If <S%H518><s%> thou return at all <S%H7725><s%> <S%H7725><s%> in peace, <S%H7965><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath not <S%H3808><s%> spoken <S%H1696><s%> by me. And he said, <S%H559><s%> Hearken, <S%H8085><s%> O people, <S%H5971><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> one of you.
So the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to Ramoth-gilead. <S%H7433><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Jehoshaphat, <S%H3092><s%> I will disguise myself, <S%H2664><s%> and enter <S%H935><s%> into the battle; <S%H4421><s%> but put <S%H3847><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> on thy robes. <S%H899><s%> And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> disguised himself, <S%H2664><s%> and went <S%H935><s%> into the battle. <S%H4421><s%>

But the king <S%H4428><s%> of Syria <S%H758><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H834><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> captains that had rule over <S%H8269><s%> his <S%H834><s%> chariots, <S%H7393><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Fight <S%H3898><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> with <S%H854><s%> small <S%H6996><s%> nor great, <S%H1419><s%> save <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> only <S%H905><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when the captains <S%H8269><s%> of the chariots <S%H7393><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jehoshaphat, <S%H3092><s%> that they <S%H1992><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Surely <S%H389><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> And they turned aside <S%H5493><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him: and Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> cried out. <S%H2199><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when the captains <S%H8269><s%> of the chariots <S%H7393><s%> perceived <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> was not <S%H3808><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they turned back <S%H7725><s%> from pursuing <S%H4480><s%> <S%H310><s%> him.

And a certain man <S%H376><s%> drew <S%H4900><s%> a bow <S%H7198><s%> at a venture, <S%H8537><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the joints <S%H1694><s%> of the harness: <S%H8302><s%> wherefore he said <S%H559><s%> unto the driver of his chariot, <S%H7395><s%> Turn <S%H2015><s%> thine hand, <S%H3027><s%> and carry me out <S%H3318><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the host; <S%H4264><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I am wounded. <S%H2470><s%>

And the battle <S%H4421><s%> increased <S%H5927><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> stayed up <S%H5975><s%> in his chariot <S%H4818><s%> against <S%H5227><s%> the Syrians, <S%H758><s%> and died <S%H4191><s%> at even: <S%H6153><s%> and the blood <S%H1818><s%> ran out <S%H3332><s%> of the wound <S%H4347><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the midst <S%H2436><s%> of the chariot. <S%H7393><s%>

And there went <S%H5674><s%> a proclamation <S%H7440><s%> throughout the host <S%H4264><s%> about the going down <S%H935><s%> of the sun, <S%H8121><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Every man <S%H376><s%> to <S%H413><s%> his city, <S%H5892><s%> and every man <S%H376><s%> to <S%H413><s%> his own country. <S%H776><s%>
So the king <S%H4428><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and was brought <S%H935><s%> to Samaria; <S%H8111><s%> and they buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H853><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> in Samaria. <S%H8111><s%>

And one washed <S%H7857><s%> <S%H853><s%> the chariot <S%H7393><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the pool <S%H1295><s%> of Samaria; <S%H8111><s%> and the dogs <S%H3611><s%> licked up <S%H3952><s%> <S%H853><s%> his blood; <S%H1818><s%> and they washed <S%H7364><s%> his armor; <S%H2185><s%> according unto the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he spoke. <S%H1696><s%>

Now the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the acts <S%H1697><s%> of Ahab, <S%H256><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he did, <S%H6213><s%> and the ivory <S%H8127><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he made, <S%H1129><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he built, <S%H1129><s%> are they <S%H1992><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> written <S%H3789><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the book <S%H5612><s%> of the chronicles <S%H1697><s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Israel? <S%H3478><s%>
So Ahab <S%H256><s%> slept <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> his fathers; <S%H1><s%> and Ahaziah <S%H274><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in his stead. <S%H8478><s%>
